our_mission_text: Creating websites that are not just beautiful, but also sell.
our_approach_text: Combining AI, design, and content for maximum effectiveness.
our_team_text: Web, design, and marketing professionals ready to bring your ideas to life.
price_a: Each project is individual, but prices start from 1500₪. We discuss based on the task.
time_a: Usually 7-14 days. If urgent, we can speed it up.
client_needs_q: What do you need from the client?
client_needs_a: Logo, photos, description. If not available, we'll help gather them.
support_a: Yes. We don't abandon you. Subscription or one-time assistance is possible.
ai_code_text: Artificial intelligence at all stages. Fast, smart, effective.
design_sells_text: Clear style, structure, taste. A website that works and wows.
content_key_text: Photos, videos, text. We do it all — you just launch.
glitch_subtitle: AI, design, speed. We don't just make websites — we make them wow.
hero_subtitle_part1: Minimalism. Speed. Aesthetics. We use AI and experience to make your website
service_selling_site_desc: Modern design, responsiveness, clear structure. A client enters — and stays.
service_portfolio_desc: Photos, videos, slides — all beautiful and convenient on one page.
service_qr_price_desc: Scan and that's it: services, prices, examples. No PDFs or tables.
service_business_card_desc: Mini-site with necessary links — more beautiful than any Linktree.
service_visual_style_desc: Photos, colors, structure — we assemble your brand turnkey.
service_feedback_desc: Application, order, and question forms directly on the website. Everything works.
